Only a thorough independent investigation, followed by real reform, can finally solve the deeply rooted problems at the VA.
With Secretary Shinseki's resignation today, we can begin to address the systemic dysfunction that has plagued Veterans Affairs for years.
It is our duty to ensure that n veteran is ever subjected to excessive wait times or substandard care.
Our veterans, who sacrificed their safety and risked their lives for their country, deserve the best care our nation can provide.
